summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Settings page, Integration Status, and Inline Editing features. All backend APIs (18/18 tests passed) and frontend features working correctly. Email sending via Resend verified end-to-end.
passed_tests: Settings page loads correctly with all sections
Integration Status shows Resend connected, Brevo connected, Google not connected
Settings can be saved and persisted (verified via reload)
Dashboard shows proposal stats (11 total, 8 in progress, 0 accepted, 3 sent)
Dashboard shows list of proposals with filter tabs
Inline editing from dashboard - edit button opens form
Inline editing - all fields present (client name, budget, timeline, deal value, status)
Inline editing - save and cancel buttons work
Inline editing - changes persist after save
Proposal detail page loads with status badge
Proposal detail page - status change dropdown works
Proposal detail page - Send Email button opens dialog
Email dialog - recipient email and custom message inputs present
Email sending via Resend API - end-to-end verified
Email logs created and retrievable
PDF Export button present on proposal detail
Edit Content button present on proposal detail
Sidebar includes Settings navigation link
All navigation links work (Dashboard, Create Proposal, Clause Library, Analytics, Settings)
Backend: Integration status endpoints (Resend, Brevo, Google)
Backend: Settings GET/POST endpoints
Backend: Proposal PATCH for inline editing
Backend: Stats endpoint
Backend: Brevo opportunities and pending deals endpoints
Backend: Email sending and logs endpoints
seed_data_creation: Test proposals created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features (Settings page, Integration Status, Inline Editing) are fully functional. Email sending via Resend is working with real API. Google Docs integration shows 'Not Connected' as expected (no credentials configured). Previous iteration issues (AI generation frontend timeout) were not retested in this iteration as they were not in scope.
